sys_template.name: Branch - Missing Cashing Up Item
sys_template.short_description: Sales Order missing from the cashing up screen
sys_template.template:
short_description=Sales Order missing from the cashing up screen^instructions=Check that there are no sales orders with multiple methods of payment and then run BR.CRECSHTRNBP1.
If there are tickets with a multiple method of payment then seek approval from a senior or manager to manually create a BR.CASHTRANS item.^affected_system=Branch Systems (RPN)^cmdb_ci=SFT-CASHUP-RPN^close_notes=Ran BR.CRECSHTRNBP1 to put the ticket back into cashing up.^contact_type=phone^impact=3^category=Data^subcategory=Data or file missing^close_code=Solved (permanently)
